text: 1.3 Luk 11.28, Jem 5.8, 1 Pi 4.7, Lep 22.7, 22.10 God ne gos anɨb okok ñek, mɨj awl kɨl tɨkɨl agñebin. Pen wulep mɨdeb, tap anɨb okok gɨjunɨgab ak nɨm, binɨb takaw tɨkebin anɨb awl pi ak nɨgɨlɨg nɨgɨnɨgabal okok sek, binɨb pi ak nɨgɨlɨg agñel nɨŋɨd dɨnɨgabal okok sek God gek, mɨñmɨñ gɨnɨgabal.
